subject: Basques
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Though Peter Sagan won Stage 7, Juan José Oroz and his Euskaltel-Euskadi team would not be too disappointed: the 100th Tour heads into their home turf, the Pyrenees, this weekend.
snippet: Though Peter Sagan won Stage 7, Juan José Oroz and his Euskaltel-Euskadi team would not be too disappointed: the 100th Tour heads into their home turf, the Pyrenees, this weekend.
